name: A Mozilla-Zine Logo
description:
Logo CSS for 1440x900 style 62326

Presented because I really like http://forums.mozillazine.org/index.php

In no way, shape or form is this endorsed by, or connected with, Mozilla or Mozilla-zine.
additional_info:
See the comment section at the end.
Edit it for your url pic (or base64 string), size and position and adjust the parameters appropriately.
130-150 px in height and 700-1200 px in width is recommended - again, adjust the Style accordingly.
